name: Test Cases
description: Describes how the 'More' button exists on each strand and takes users to gallery view/More Grid ViewÊof the strand.The "More" tile is a button that performs 'Go to gallery/More button' action when it is focusedIf the user holds down the D-Pad 'right' key, the "More" tile will be focused (if there).Every strand on the main menu has a 'More' option at the end except Timeline strand which has More button on the far left endGallery view/More Grid View loadsSome of the strands like My Shows needs at least 7 programs in order to show More button on he strand.Preconditions:ÊHave watched and favorited at least 7 programs
